name: Guilt Battle Arena
description: Can you make a difference with only one bullet? Guilt Battle Arena is a frantic, local multiplayer party game for 1 to 4 players. Make room on your couch for friends, pick an insanely cute character, and turn the competition up to 11!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.86 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Gaming Controller Highly Recommended
